DataElement.preferredName: AUA-SI 7 How Many Times Most Typically Get Up to Urinate from Bedtime at Night to Time Get Up in Morning Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how many times they most typically had to get up to urinate from the time they went to bed at night until the time they got up in the morning, using a 6 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: American Urological Association Symptom Score Past 30 Days How Many Times Typically Get Up to Urinate During Nighttime Sleep Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to help men determine how bothersome their benign prostatic hyperplasia urinary symptoms are and to determine how effective their treatment is._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about the most typical number of times an individual has or had to get up to urinate from the time they went to bed at night until the time they got up in the morning._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to help men determine how bothersome their benign prostatic hyperplasia urinary symptoms are and to determine how effective their treatment is.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to help men determine how bothersome their benign prostatic hyperplasia urinary symptoms are and to determine how effective their treatment is.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Many Times Typically Get Up to Urinate During Nighttime Sleep Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about the most typical number of times an individual has or had to get up to urinate from the time they went to bed at night until the time they got up in the morning.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Many Times Typically Get Up to Urinate During Nighttime Sleep
Concepts.definition: A question about the most typical number of times an individual has or had to get up to urinate from the time they went to bed at night until the time they got up in the morning.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CCR study 17C0153 in C3D. mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to help men determine how bothersome their benign prostatic hyperplasia urinary symptoms are and to determine how effective their treatment is._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened less than one in five times.

Concepts.longName: Less than One Time in Five
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened less than one in five times.
A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.
